fields.System.Title: As a customer, I should be able to update conference room reservation
fields.System.Description:
As a customer, I should be able to update conference room reservation such that:

1. When a conference room is already reserved, an update option should be available

fields.System.Title: As a customer, I should be able to update my details
fields.System.Description: Sometimes customers need to change the card info that they have on record with your business, whether that‚Äôs just to swap in a preferred card, or because the card issuer sent a replacement.

fields.System.Title: As a customer, I would like to reserve a conference room
fields.System.Description:
As a customer, I would like to reserve a conference room such that:

1. It should display available date and time slots
2. Give an option to reserve a conference room for X hours
3. One can reserve a conference room for max 4 hours per day

fields.System.Title: As a reservation agent, I would like to send confirmations to guest
fields.System.Description: Enter the guest's name to whom you would like to send a confirmation, display the company, contact, source and agent associated with the reservation.

fields.System.Title: As a customer, I should be able to remove a car reservation
fields.System.Description:
If you have not picked up your vehicle you can remove or cancel your reservation by clicking here.


1. Car reserved should have an option to cancel the request
2. Car driver should receive a notification about cancellation

fields.System.Title: As a customer, I should be able to request hotel for late Check-out
fields.System.Description:
As a courtesy, grant an extra hour or two to leave the room, especially if it isn't booked for the upcoming evening. But customer must call the front desk in advance and request a late checkout.


1. Late Check-in time should be displayed
2. Request should be sent to front-desk 
3. Any extra charge should be displayed

fields.System.Title: As a customer, I should be able to a reserve car
fields.System.Description:
As a customer, I should be able to a reserve car such that:

1. Car can be reserved and paid through the hotel

fields.System.Title: As a hotel manager, I should be able to view current guest list
fields.System.Description:
Show current guests list such that it includes:

1. Guest first and last name
2. Check-in and check-out date

fields.System.Title: As a customer, I should be able to change reservation time
fields.System.Description: Change reservation time

fields.System.Title: As a room guest, I should be able to communicate with all smart devices from the app
fields.System.Description: The smartphone will be the room's remote control. Through the app, the guest will be able to seamlessly control the room‚Äôs lighting, HVAC [heating, ventilation, and air conditioning], and entertainment options, including pre-loaded and streaming content.

fields.System.Title: As a room guest, I should be able to connect to the app with my own device
As a reservation agent, I would like to search for available rooms
fields.System.Description: The Reservation Agent should be able to assist customers with planning and booking reservations. This can mean booking a hotel room, a car rental, airplane tickets, a cruise package or tickets to a show. They may also help plan travel itineraries by suggesting local tourist attractions and places of interest. They then process payments and send the details and confirmation to the guest. When issues arise with reservations, the Reservation Agent is often contacted to sort out the issues.

fields.System.Title: As a reservation agent, I would like to send confirmations to guest
fields.System.Description:
A written confirmation from the reservation agent stating the confirmation of name, arrival departure date, number of guest staying, room rate, type of room booked, number of rooms, pick up details, details of deposit made, package details etc. should be sent out.
Confirmation letter may also include the cancellation and no-show polices of the hotel. And also about the retention charges, hotel standard check-in and check-out time, early morning / early arrival charges and also about late departure charges.

fields.System.Title: As a room guest, I should be able to personalize the app with themes
fields.System.Description: The user should be able to personalize the SMH360 app with themes available in the settings menu and also be able to personalize the app with customized themes on the Android and IOS app.

fields.System.Title: As a customer, I should be able to have a responsive search experience
fields.System.Description: The site should have responsive design for a better search experience, regardless of the device being used. The website adjusts automatically to the size of device‚Äôs screen and the user doesn‚Äôt have to browse through multiple pages to find what he is looking for, giving users a very smooth and optimized experience on the device.

fields.System.Title: As a customer, I should be able to access the app on all mobile platforms
fields.System.Description:
The guest should be able to access the SMH360 app on platforms - 

1. Google PlayStore
2. Apple Itunes
3. Windows Store

fields.System.Title: As a customer, I should be able to make a reservation
fields.System.Description: The user should be able to make a new reservation by clicking the "Make a Reservation" button in the site or in the app.

fields.System.Title: As a customer, I would like to modify an existing reservation
fields.System.Description: The user should be able to modify his existing reservation if the reservation hasnt already ended.

fields.System.Title: As a customer, I would like to make a new reservation
fields.System.Description: As a customer, I would like to make a new reservation

fields.System.Title: As a user, I should be able to cancel an existing booking of a conference room
fields.System.Description: Conference Room - Cancel an existing reservation

fields.System.Title: As a front-desk admin, I should be able to print breakfast coupons
fields.System.Description:
As a front-desk admin, I should be able to print breakfast coupons such that:

1. Complementary breakfast coupons should be provided for each checked-in guest
2. Guest names should be printed so that it is non transferable
3. Coupons should have unique barcode

attributes.comment: Making a new link for the dependency
Making a new link for the dependency
Making a new link for the dependency

fields.System.Title: As a hotel manager, I should be able to see guest list for a date
fields.System.Description:
As a hotel manager, I should be able to see guest list for a particular date:

The guest list should include the following:

1. Guest first and last name
2. Check-in and check-out date
3. Advance amount paid
4. Balance amount to be paid
5. Booking mode

attributes.comment: Making a new link for the dependency
Making a new link for the dependency
Making a new link for the dependency
Making a new link for the dependency

fields.System.Title: As a customer, I should be able to use Bluetooth-enabled IoT Beacon sensors for registration
fields.System.Description:
As a user, I should be able to able to use Bluetooth-enabled IoT Beacon sensors for registration such that:

1. As soon as a guest enters the hotel lobby, he should be registered automatically

fields.System.Title: As a room guest, I should be able to enter the room with facial recognition
fields.System.Description: The guests should be able to check into their room with a quick scan of their face. To use the new feature, hotel guests must first scan their IDs, get their face scanned, and then add their contact details. Once the guest's booking information and identity have been confirmed, a room key will be presented.

fields.System.Title: As a room guest, I should be able to control my room's lighting within the app
fields.System.Description: The guest should be able to control the room lighting and welcome light. When the room is empty, the lights should be out.  When the guest enters the room, a welcome light should be on automatically. Sensor can be motion-based, daylight-sensing or a combination and placed in aisles, bathrooms, elevators, seating areas, conference rooms and more.

fields.System.Title: As a customer, I should be able to have a keyless entry to my room via smartphone
fields.System.Description: The hotel should configure the room key to the guest's mobile phone. With a single download, guests should be able to check-in and gain access to their hotel room and hotel amenities.
